attributes.action: Neo-Liberal Free Market Capitalism Has Failed: A Call For a National Discourse On The Alternatives
attributes.additional_details: The current system of economic organisation is clearly broken. We, the undersigned, demand a rational, public debate on the alternative models and the steps needed to ensure a more equal and harmonious society. The gap between the rich and poor is an abomination; whilst the corrosive, morally contemptible actions of bankers and greedy corporations continues to benefit just a small minority at the expense of the average working man. This must change if we are to stop the slide towards further moral and economic decline.
